title: Woman dies in apparent shooting in East Cleveland
content:
EAST CLEVELAND, Ohio -- A woman was found dead early Saturday in an apparent shooting, police said.
The woman was found dead of apparent gunshot wounds on First Avenue, off Hayden Avenue. The area is made up of mostly abandoned buildings.
Police said they were called to the area because of reported gunfire. They found the woman with apparent gunshot wounds and requested an ambulance.
The woman was later pronounced dead, police said.
Investigators spent the night investigating the shooting and trying to identify the woman, who had no identification with her when she was found, police said.
Police said they were able to tentatively identify her later in the morning. The Cuyahoga County Medical Examiner will release the woman's identity after her family is notified.
